description: Three teachers' unions overwhelmingly decide to take industrial action in their pay dispute.
title: Isle of Man teachers vote to strike in pay dispute
title_page: Isle of Man teachers vote to strike in pay dispute - BBC News
maintext: The National Association of Schoolmasters, Union of Women Teachers (NASUWT) said that while industrial action was "to be regretted", the union had "no option but to take this unprecedented step".
